features: Smart bike helmet that beautifully integrates lights, brake signal, turn signals.
Lumos meets the rigorous safety standards of the CPSC (USA), ASTM F1447 (Canada) and EN1078 (Europe).
MIPS (Multi-directional Impact System) protection integrated. An additional layer of safety to protect your head against rotational forces on impact.
6 hours battery life on blinking mode, and 3 hours on solid mode.
48 individual LEDs in the front and back to ensure your visibility on the road. Be seen, be safe!
Rechargeable battery with charging cable included.
Wireless remote to control turn signal.
